page.title: 21New Ark Adventure Playground-still here after 35 years!
page.content:
New Ark Adventure Playground was started on this site in February 1981 by a group of parents.For 5 years before that

there had been a New Ark on a temporary site,now under the Parkway.Children of all ages come to New Ark to use the Adventure Playground,City Farm,Eco Garden & Eco Centre.Many of the current children have parents who came here too.This place is at the centre of the local community,

The site is 2.5 acres--the adventure playground & main building ,the farm,& the garden with Eco Centre.This is a special place much loved by all the children who have ever played here!
elisabeth buck
